messages.subject: Re: Why continual et al
messages.msgSnippet: ... been. Where have you been? I m on several homeschool mailing lists, and a message board, as well as being involved in a few real-life support groups, and I
messages.messageBody:
----------
>From: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2290
>Date: Mon, Aug 26, 2002, 11:30 AM
>

> I don't see much more than "follow the leader" going on anywhere else I've
been.

Where have you been?

I'm on several homeschool mailing lists, and a message board, as well as
being involved in a few real-life support groups, and I have found none of
them fit this statement:

>I find it to be a "let's all follow the pied piper over the cliff" type of
attitude.

Just curious, as leading homeschoolers is akin to herding cats, in my
observations of the species'.

Pam
